author: CCAZB
title: Fabulous Stay
text:
Had a 3 night stay in this wonderful boutique hotel ,the staff are so helpful and friendly.It was our first trip to Rome ,this year we celebrate 30 years of marriage .Would highly reccomend this hotel ,the hotel is modern and beautifully presented.The rooms are well presented,not overly spacious but very comfortable.The manager and staff are so professional and incredibly thoughtful ,we returned to our room after a busy day sightseeing to find a lovely bottle of Prosecco chilling in an ice bucket waiting for us.The breakfast room is bright and cheerful with a couple of terraces to sit "Al Fresco " ,weather permitting .Will definately return to this hotel and bring our two daughters with us next time .The hotel is only minutes from the Colliseum and well situated for all attractions ,no noise at night and very safe area
Room Tip: The rooms on higher levels at the front of the hotel probably have views of the Colliseum See more room tips
